ArgonTest.Name: Generic method
ArgonTest.InputSource:
import Argon.Core/*
trait MyTrait <: Object public abstract def _.identity (T: type) (value: T): T end
constructor Ctor (): MyTrait public override def _.identity (T: type) (value: T): T = value end
proc main(): () do val inst = Ctor () puts (inst.identity String 'Hello World') end
